subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: The world champion Rok Flander beat Daniel Biveson in the final of the season-opening parallel giant slalom on the Snowboard World Cup circuit yesterday in Sölden, Austria. Adam Smith came in third by defeating Benjamin Karl in the small final.
snippet: The world champion Rok Flander beat Daniel Biveson in the final of the season-opening parallel giant slalom on the Snowboard World Cup circuit yesterday in Sölden, Austria. Adam Smith came in third by defeating Benjamin Karl in the small final.
